oneOf.description: A bid can be reinforced when it is the winning bid.
A bid can be reinforced when it is the winning bid, or overturned with a greater bid.
A bid can be reinforced if it is equivalent to the winning bid after reinforcement.

deadzone_size.description: Number of steps (as a fraction of the overall number in the deck) that control is turned over, but neither side goes up a level.

num_steps_to_non_landlord_turnover.description: Number of steps (as a fraction of the overall number in the deck) necessary to give the attacking team landlord.

step_adjustments.description: Number-of-deck-based adjustments to the step size

step_size_per_deck.description: Number of points per "step" in the deck.

OrderedCard.description: A wrapper around a card with a given trump, which provides ordering characteristics.

min_count.description: The minimum number of cards in each unit of the tractor

min_length.description: The minimum length of the tractor

played_card_mappings.description:
A parallel array to `played_cards` which contains the units corresponding to played cards that match the `trick_format`, or `None` if they don't match.

TODO: remove default deserialization attribute in a few days.

oneOf.description: Don't require longer tuples to be drawn if the original format was a shorter tuple.
Only allow tractors to be drawn if the original format was also a tractor.
